p: The MaxEnt models based on RCP2.6 emission scenarios for the potential distribution of P. solenopsis in 2050 are presented in Fig 5 and Table 2. The predicted area gains in the area of suitable habitat is 14,713,902 km 2, which is an increase of 15% over the current suitable habitat area. The highly suitable area expands to 4,116,978 km 2 (ca. increase of 46.8% over the current highly suitable areas), including more of Asia, such as Burma, south Korea, the Philippines, China, India, Japan, Laos, Vietnam, Bangladesh, Pakistan and Ukraine in Europe. In addition, the suitable habitat was increased in North America (native area).
